mapper.select: SELECT wg.chat_id, wg.group_name, wu.user_name as ownerName, COUNT(wgm.id) as groupMemberNum, wgm.join_time, (SELECT count(*) FROM we_group_member wgmr WHERE wgmr.chat_id = wg.chat_id and wgmr.user_id = #{userId}) as commonGroup FROM `we_group` wg LEFT JOIN we_group_member wgm ON wgm.chat_id = wg.chat_id LEFT JOIN we_user wu ON wg.corp_id = wu.corp_id and wg.`owner` = wu.user_id WHERE wg.corp_id = #{corpId} AND wgm.user_id = #{externalUserid} GROUP BY wg.chat_id

SELECT wg.chat_id, wg.group_name, wg.create_time, wg.notice, wu.user_name AS groupLeaderName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM we_group_member wgm WHERE wgm.chat_id = wg.chat_id) as memberNum, wg.status, wg.`owner`, wu.user_id AS userIds FROM we_group wg LEFT JOIN we_group_member wgm ON wg.chat_id = wgm.chat_id LEFT JOIN we_user wu ON wu.corp_id = wg.corp_id and wg.owner = wu.user_id WHERE wg.corp_id = #{corpId} and wgm.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT wg.chat_id, wg.group_name, wg.create_time, wu.user_name as userName, (SELECT wd.name FROM we_department wd WHERE wu.main_department = wd.id AND wd.corp_id = wg.corp_id) as mainDepartmentName, wg.status, wg.`owner` FROM we_group wg LEFT JOIN we_user wu ON wg.corp_id = wu.corp_id AND wg.`owner`=wu.user_id
wg.group_name LIKE concat('%', #{chatName}, '%')
